id.description: Globally unique identifier for the Sender

version.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the resource last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the Sender

flow_id.description: ID of the Flow currently passing via this Sender

transport.description: Transport type used by the Sender in URN format

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering Senders. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.

device_id.description: Device ID which this Sender forms part of

manifest_href.description: HTTP URL to a file describing how to connect to the Sender (SDP for RTP)
